Text: loved the manga n def loved this live action too.better than shinobi,to me.downloaded it from asiatorrents..has pretty good eng sub there..

yea. yuizaki posted his subtitle file there as well but i worked on it a bit more so it was similar to some of the official translation for the english manga. plus there were some parts which none of the guys @ asiatorrents translated which i did as well
its definitely one of the best live action adaptation done so far
how's the A/V quality? I just started downloading.

Good audio good video, enjoy.
Sessha wa rurouni.
